knimeNode.name: Reproject WKT geometries
knimeNode.shortDescription: Projects WKT geometries into another Coordinate Reference System (CRS).

fullDescription.intro:
Projects WKT (Well-known Text) geometries into another Coordinate Reference System (CRS).
Note that the target Coordinate Reference System should be compliant with the locations of geometries.
The actual processing is done by the wonderful geotools library.
